metadata.title: MAYIWO Aocate Dial Adjustable Glasses Variable Focus For Reading Distance Vision Eyeglasses, Black, 28.0 grams
features: Variable focuses for instant 20/20 vision & clarity.
Adjustable focus range -6.0 to +3.0, giving you fine control over the magnification.
Multiple purposes: Reading, watching TV, & using a computer - you only need one pair of glasses to do them all.
Dynamic power optic lenses for nearsighted & myopic as well as farsightedness, great for men & women of various ages.
description: Our reading eyewear is the fully adjustable eyeglasses that let you match your vision focus. Itâ€™s the perfect backup pair of glasses should something happen to your regular pair.Specifications:Gender: UnisexAdjustable Focus: -6.00 to +3.00Material: PCColor: BlackLens Height: 35mm/1.38inLens Width: 51mm/2.01inBridge: 16mm/0.63in Leg Height: 126mm/4.96inPackage included:1 x Adjustable Strength Lens Reading Glasses1 x glasses case1 x cleaning cloth1 x English User Manual Usage methodHyperopia:1. Please cover one eye with your hand, and look at the objects 6 meters away. At the same time, turn the adjusting button with the other hand forward or backward until you can see the object clearly.2. Cover the other eye and repeat3. After the left and right eyes are adjusted respectively, both hands will fine tune the left and right rotary buttons until they are the most suitable pupil distanceMyopia: focus on an object and set aside a suitable distance for readingRepeat the above stepsNote:These eyeglasses will not correct astigmatism. The lenses in these glasses are not for prescription lenses. DO NOT use for driving and other operating heavy machinery.
